short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads the highest resolution favicon from the current website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads highest resolution square icon (favicon) available on any give site and stores it in your Downloads folder with a simplified name "domain-com-favicon.png". Great when you need square icon to update your CRM or any other productivity app.
